dcterms:description: The UCY dataset contains three sequences, namely ZARA-01, ZARA-02 and University, which have been acquired in two different scenarios from a birdâ€™s eye view. It includes annotations for human-human interactions.
dcterms:title: UCY

dcterms:description: MuseumVisits is a new dataset acquired in the hall of a big art museum using four cameras, capturing groups of persons during their visits. It includes rich human-human and human-space interactions.
dcterms:title: MuseumVisits

dcterms:creator: Alon Lerner
Yiorgos Chrysanthou
Dani Lischinski
dcterms:description: ZARA is part of the UCY dataset and presents a moderately crowded condition with persons walking in different directions and groups of persons.
dcterms:title: ZARA
